Reviews.Title: “Cozy and clean Inn”
Reviews.Author: Carol34859
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel july 2011 visiting son fancy cozy clean located downtown walking distance staff extrememly friendly free upgrade larger breakfast guest laundry business center nice enjoyed stay stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: Charles C
Reviews.Content: minute business trip friends recommended hotels booked hotel fairly close downtown pleasantly suprised clean spacious fast internet evenings family runs nice invited tea evening im western colorado travel lot expecting budget hotel iron ironing board nicest ive hotel discussions artists laborers guests owned tie 5 taxi convention center little italy

Reviews.Title: “Location ideal, Not Luxury, but great bang for the Buck, will do over!”
Reviews.Author: hiho64
Reviews.Content: location gas lamp plaza mall 6 blocks hill cab runs 5 aaa card fabulous rate shocked nice tv micro fridge nice bathroom comfy size bed perfect cuddling clean continental breakfast morning plus parking street parking found free 6pm 8 am weekdays weekends didnt children running guests mid believe 3 floors elevators available staff pleasant def unless planning indoor getaway san diego

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleasant Stay, Good Price”
Reviews.Author: Giboze
Reviews.Content: hotel street friends chose freeway quiet city hotel outside clean beds comfortable hotel staff accommodating parking tight spaces liked little touches microwave refrigerator hand lotion packets safe definitely recommend friends family

Reviews.Title: “BED BUGS!!!!”
Reviews.Author: zeppy12
Reviews.Content: friends stayed nights friends red looking spots chest arms legs allergic reaction ate couple days slept beds infested worse ant mosquito bites week weve suffering
